Package neuralnetwork.trainer

Class Trainer

java.lang.Object
neuralnetwork.trainer.Trainer
public class Trainer
extends java.lang.Object
Provides methods for performing gradient descend on a neural network, with methods for computing gradient and update weights accordingly.
Author:
Valdemar Melin
See Also:
test package for usage.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Trainer​(Model model)
    Create a trainer from a neural network model.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double cost​(double[][] inputs, double[][] outputs)
    Computes the cost function of the specified training data.
    void eval​(double[][] inputs, double[][] outputs)
    Computes the gradient of the cost function with respect to the specified training data.
    double[] getOutput​(double[] input)
    Returns the output of the model with current weights
    void randomizeWeights​(double iv)
    Randomizes the model's weights in the interval [-iv, iv].
    void step​(double s)
    Takes a step in the opposite direction of the gradient with a factor s.

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Trainer

      public Trainer​(Model model)
      Create a trainer from a neural network model.
      Parameters:
      model - - the model.

  • Method Details

    • randomizeWeights

      public void randomizeWeights​(double iv)
      Randomizes the model's weights in the interval [-iv, iv].
      Parameters:
      iv - - the largest absolute value of the weights after the randomization.

    • eval

      public void eval​(double[][] inputs, double[][] outputs)
      Computes the gradient of the cost function with respect to the specified training data.
      Parameters:
      inputs - - an array containing the input data.
      outputs - - an array containing the output data.

    • cost

      public double cost​(double[][] inputs, double[][] outputs)
      Computes the cost function of the specified training data.
      Parameters:
      inputs - - an array containing the input data.
      outputs - - an array containing the output data.

    • step

      public void step​(double s)
      Takes a step in the opposite direction of the gradient with a factor s.
      Parameters:
      s - - the step scale factor.

    • getOutput

      public double[] getOutput​(double[] input)
      Returns the output of the model with current weights
      Parameters:
      input - - the input to the model
      Returns:
      - the output of the model.
